backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing user profiles and balances with access control enforcing user and admin permissions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing UI copy changes and related files for compliance with neutral product language requirements.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and UI changes of various frontend files after branding updates.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base styles defining warm neutral OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting the neutral document title and mounting the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component handling authentication, profile setup, and routing to the card dashboard.
frontend/src/components/AddMoneyDialog.t: Modal allowing users to enter and submit an amount to add to their balance with validation and quick options.
frontend/src/components/DigitalCard.tsx: Component rendering a styled digital debit card with card details and branding.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Button component managing Internet Identity login/logout and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: Modal form for entering and validating a user's name, then saving the profile via mutation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBalance.ts: Provides hooks to fetch the user's balance and add money via actor mutations with query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context provider and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and login state.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Hooks to fetch and update the caller's user profile using the backend actor with query invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup defining light and dark theme CSS variables and base styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/CardDashboard.tsx: Dashboard displaying balance, digital card, profile name, and addâ€‘money dialog with loading states.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config enabling dark mode, custom fonts, OKLCH color tokens, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: JSON describing project state, feature definitions, architectural notes, and pending feature requests for a digital debit card app.
